content: I'm looking to get a bike rack for my car, so I can take my road bike on longer trips. I've been researching Thule and Saris racks, but I'm not sure which one to choose. Can you tell me more about the differences between them? By the way, I've been doing a lot of early morning rides lately, and my new NiteRider lights, which I bought on April 5th, have been a lifesaver.
